name: European Central Counterparty N.V.
goal: EuroCCP is a central counterparty for trades in equities.  Our business goal is to minimize post-trade costs, maximize netting, increase capital efficiency, and continuously improve risk management for the benefit of our clients.
interests: Banking and financial services, Competition, Economy, finance and the euro, Single market
euInitiatives: Legislation related to equities trading and post-trading services, especially regulatory initiatives with an impact on central counterparties and clients of central counterparty clearing services.  Corporate activities, such as mergers and acquisitions, of market infrastructures in the trading, clearing and settlement sectors.
